Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, clean rooms.”
Reviews.Author: Ativ A
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at this hotel for two days, it was business trip that's why we needed only bed and pillow.Rooms are small but clean, everything woked well except safety box. Iron, ironing board and hair dryer you have to take from reception but it didn't really bother us. At the same time staff was very friendly, may be we were so lucky :-) Breakfast is very primitive but since I can not eat a lot in the morning I was satisfied with VERY limited choice. Do not expect a lot from the hotel. It is a place just for sleep!You better be positive and enjoy perfect location that can't keep you inside :-)

Reviews.Title: “excellent location, bad service, bad room. , bad hygiene.”
Reviews.Author: Zimz
Reviews.Content: I don't know why some people commented about the good service provided here. are there any other park view hotel in singapore? Anyway, this review is for park view hotel located in bugis. The only good thing about this hotel is its location. Excellent, close to mrt station, very reachable with mrt from the airport. It's also close to bugis junction. The room is... just barely enough to be called as hotel room. It's more like boarding house. There are strands of hair in the sink and the bathtub. It depends though, if you're just like me who doesn't care about these things, you might find the room adequate. The service is... terrible. The hotel staff is cold. You have to pay up front, which means if you want to check out early you might face some problem with the payment. The worst thing is when you put your laundry. it will take 24 hours to complete your laundry, or you have to pay extra 50% for one day service. And the hotel asked you to pay after each laundry order completed AND you have to pick your laundry to the receptionist. This happened to me, and I bluntly refused to pay and go down to take my laundry. I asked them to deliver the laundry into my room, and the receptionist delivered the laundry yo my room. I've never been in a hotel that asking its guests to pick up their own laundry.the staffs nt. Overall, this hotel is ok if only need a place to sleep on the night, and just need a place to lay down and sleep, and don't really care about the molds and the dirtiness. But you could get much better hotel with same price.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Morphious
Reviews.Content: Was mostly there for work and a bit of shopping. They have rooms without windows. This was a bit strange but helps with sleep since most tec stores don't open till round 11 am. Very central place. Walking distance to Buggis and city MRTs. Check in time is 14.00 which is not great. Breakfast was included but was tasteless. Overall a good place if you want a place to crash and will not be spending too much time at the hotel. I would prob stay there again if I go on a similar non vacational trip.

Reviews.Title: “Just forget about this option and find someplace else.”
Reviews.Author: Kevinljs
Reviews.Content: We have to pay in full before we stay. The room is super cramped and old. There are inadequate power plugs (problem when wanting hair blower in front of miror This was superior room. The shower heater runs out of hot water very quickly. No toothbrush provided. Our blanket duvet was never replaced with new one after we requested them to. Had to sleep using the thin makeshift blanket for 3 nights. Breakfast was basic, staff were not helpful. Asked for hair drier and had to go to reception to pick it up ourself. Reliable guard to our belongings ater checkout. yes thats a positive comment. Good location.

Reviews.Title: “Between Average & Very Good”
Reviews.Author: Avijeet
Reviews.Content: Location: The Best in its price range. Bugis MRT, Merlion Park, 24 Hr Shops Food Courts, Street Food all at a stone throw distance. Price: Singapore is expensive so i wont complain. Room: Too small for my liking.... go for the corner rooms they are better. No openable window is a big - Cleanliness: Yes its ok But still "Do not look under the bed" category hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: TimJacobs
Reviews.Content: Was very happy to stay at the park view hotel. Had a lovely room with a nice television and a lovely soft and big bed. The breakfast was alright and the service was good. I stayed here for two weeks and my room was cleaned every day and cleaned very well. If i had a question about something the hotel staff was always happy to answer my questions. I left a suit jacket in my room and i only realized it a month later. So i emailed the staff asking about a jacket and they still had it. That's great. A lot of people here are complaining about the fact that there are no windows in the rooms. But upon booking you can choose if you want a room with a window or not. So its ridiculous if you're complaining about something that you could have known while booking. I stayed here in december of 2010 for two weeks and i'm staying here for three weeks in december 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: NCNG
Reviews.Content: The hotel is at strategic location & it is easy to find if you let the taxi driver knows it is beside Liang Sia Street which also known as steamboat street. 5 min walk to Bugis Junction & 7-eleven. The bus stop is just in front of the hotel and you can get taxi easily without advanced booking because Beach road is the main street. We were staying 3 nights in Superior Room & is very clean. The room is small but you can get deluxe room for bigger space. The toilet amenities are clean as well, I guess it is just refurbished, the bathtub & toilet bowl looked very new to me. Services are good but housekeepers not good in english, it maybe caused some communication issues. I stayed in 2nd floor but it is very quiet at night, no noise from outside street or room. Breakfast is simple, with sausages, hams, eggs, bread, baked beans and maybe fried noodle or rice.

Reviews.Title: “HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR TOURIST ON TIGHT BUDGET”
Reviews.Author: Pinoy_Travel_Boy
Reviews.Content: Contrary to the comments posted about this hotel, I find Park View Hotel very good. The day and night staff specially in the front desk had been very helpful. The hotel's location is very ideal as it is very near Suntec City and the Bugis area where the bargain stores are located. We went to Sentosa, Universal Studios, Singapore Flyer, Marina Bay Sands by riding the appropriate bus at the bus stop just across the street and on the return trip, alight at the bus stop right in front of the hotel! Big big savings instead of going at those places by taxi. My wife and I stayed for 3 nights. All our requests were promptly attended to. The breakfast although practically the same each morning, is adequate. Overall, Park View Hotel gives you great value for money. I'll definitely stay there next time i'm in Singapore. The only thing that i didnt like is that wifi is not free. For a mere 2hrs, i have to shell out about SGD 6.

Reviews.Title: “don't stay this hotel”
Reviews.Author: flac73
Reviews.Content: good position in singapore center but: dirty, smelly, mold in bathroom, no windows in the room, too small for two person

Reviews.Title: ““The staffs in the hotel are just.. AWFUL. NOT COMING BACK!””
Reviews.Author: asimplejazzlover
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this property for 3 nights. How can I start reviewing this property? This is written completely based on my experience and thus it is subjective and may vary to others. I have to admit that I have no expectation when booking this hotel knowing all the reviews about the rooms and whatsoever. I reached the hotel at about 10AM and I completely understand that the check in time is normally at 2PM for most hotels subject to availability. All I want is just a friendliness and warmth from the reception after a long flight but yet I got nothing. The small lobby was small and noone else was around so I was pretty sure that the reception (old cold man) noticed I was going to check in (obviously from my presence with luggages, hello). But it seems like my presence was oblivious to him... yes, that oblivious to the point that I have to alert him 3 times and I was asking if I could get an early check in, he said NO with his finger pointing at a memo on the wall which states check in at 2 PM. That I could understand. And then I asked if I could store my luggages there. And guess what, he just pointed out to a certain corner of the lobby and asked me to put them myself and even write the tag myself. I would really appreciate your warmth and helpfulness into this, but this receptionist has utterly failed. Room was dead small. I couldn't open my luggage unless it is half-opened and I have to close it after use otherwise you wouldn't be able to pass. That's enough to show the space we've got in the room. Bathroom was dirty, moulds are everywhere, on the tub, on the walls, awful thing! Breakfast was pretty adequate. It has a sufficient selection of breakfast from eggs, toasts, and sausages. Pretty good. The people at the breakfast room were also as cold as ice. I don't really like the people in the hotel, they really need a training on how to be in the service industry. Location is pretty good, just behind Bugis Junction which can take you everywhere in Singapore by trains. But trust me, with a price like this, you can get better property elsewhere. I am definitely not coming back and not gonna recommend this to my fellow travellers. The people in the hotel are just...... AWFUL. DISGUSTING!

Reviews.Title: “The staffs in the hotel are just.... AWFUL. NOT COMING BACK!”
Reviews.Author: asimplejazzlover
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this property for 3 nights. How can I start reviewing this property? This is written completely based on my experience and thus it is subjective and may vary to others. I have to admit that I have no expectation when booking this hotel knowing all the reviews about the rooms and whatsoever. I am definitely not coming back and not gonna recommend this to my fellow travellers. The people in the hotel are just...... AWFUL. DISGUSTING!

Reviews.Title: “exellent location”
Reviews.Author: oziehenk
Reviews.Content: good middle of the road hotel , room well appointed , and clean , bedding and linnen good , bathroom needed mould removed from tiling and bath/shower

Reviews.Title: “Great, Helpful Front Office Staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: leftcorner
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel. Very friendly, helpful staff Yeng and Patrick. Stayed there for 5 nights, Never had any problems. Clean room and bathroom. Breakfast is kinda boring, almost the same everyday. Definitely needs an improvement in this area. Hopefully there will be free WiFi next time around. Location is great!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Small roms but in agod location.”
Reviews.Author: premierman
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights in the Park View 29th + 30th may 2011, rooms a bit small, breakfast good, staff friendly + helpfull, ok price for a very expensive city. Hotel is very well situated just down the street from Raffles walking distance from little india + clarke quey. Would stay here again if we return to singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Small rooms, central, breakfast OK - would return”
Reviews.Author: prime01234
Reviews.Content: We staid there with 16 people for a conference. The rooms are pretty small, but large enough for everything one needs. The bathrooms are of normal size, a few black dots show, but for me that wasn't a problem. Some of our rooms had windows, some didn't, but the size was the same. The hotel is 5 minutes walk from the Suntec Convention Center, which is mainly why we chose it. Breakfast was ok even for Westeners who don't fancy fried chicken in the morning, if monotone. Fried eggs, toast and jam is fine with me, and it tackles hangovers pretty well, too. Service is fine, their english is fair. All in all, good for a budget stay in central Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “Never again...”
Reviews.Author: santIndia
Reviews.Content: There are many Park View Hotels in Singapore. We are talking about the one on 81, Beach Road. We had done an online booking for a double room with an extra bed. We were charged extra for this as we were told that the room is bigger to accommodate for an extra bed. On reaching there we were in for a big shock as the room allocated to us was very small with almost no space to walk after putting in an extra mattress. Even the central cooling in the room was not working. When we complained, they refused to admit that cooling was an issue!! They also said that this is the “big” room they were talking about. When we did not relent, they finally agreed that the actual room booked by us was bigger but they have given it to somebody else. After a lot of argument, they changed our room. The new room was bigger and comfortable. They also had a microwave and kettle in the room. The breakfast was good but the service was very slow. There was no vegetarian option (except for bread, butter and Jam) but since we are non-vegetarian, we didn’t have any problem. They used to take a lot of time to refill the buffet items, even the coffee! The staff was indifferent, neither courteous nor rude. The location of the hotel is good with the Bugis MRT station just at a 10 minutes walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sunitaa
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the hotel for a month. It is at a good location. Bugis Junction is just nearby for reasonably good price shopping. Even the Malls & Bugis MRT, Food court is around. Getting a cab, bus or MRT is easy. Rooms are reasonably spacious, neat & clean. Staff is good & very helpful. Breakfast is very basic but good. Most importantly the “ Steam Boat” Restaurants are just below to enjoy the great Singaporean hot pot food.

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: BundaFab
Reviews.Content: The hotel location is the best asset of it, since it is very near to the suntec city mall, and a walking distance to the SMRT station in bugis and esplanande. Almost all of the tourism sight in Singapore is near the hotel. The bedroom is small (we used the superior double room) and the bed is hard not quite comfortable, a better bed will be a nice improvement. The bath room cleanliness really need to be improved, but it has a bathtub (quite nice touch for a 3 star hotel in SIngapore), and the hot water work just fine The buffet breakfast is good, although if they can make a variation for each day will be better. Overall in Singapore with that kind of location, a bath tub, and free american style buffet breakfast, this hotel can be a nice option :)

Reviews.Title: “Maybe I Had A Bad Stay But...”
Reviews.Author: StillPhone
Reviews.Content: The location is good but the room I had was terrible and I upgraded at check-in because without knowing it I booked a room with no windows! They really did mean no windows as well... Not sure where TripAdvisor get their room rates from but certainly not in line with what the hotel charge. It isn't as cheap as it sounds. The hotel is tired and old... The A/C iny room didn't work and the bed was like sleeping on a plank of wood plus the TV didn't work... My upgraded room was incredibly small so maybe others were lucky. I dont know where the picture came from at the front of the reviews of this hotel but it's of another location.

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: zulu4Delhi
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for a month because of budget constrant. The Hotel is basic Hotel, with breakfast, & no frills. There is no potter service, no water bottles in the room. It is not a three star hotel. Very basic, small rooms, TV, with few channels, A/C, bathroom, the towels & soaps changed everyday. Breakfast is same very day. If you are budget traveller & want a hotel in the tourist area, then this hotel will do. Do not expect 3 or 4 star type of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for Budget-conscious Travellers”
Reviews.Author: Claudine_v
Reviews.Content: The taxi driver wasn't too familiar w/ the hotel, probably 'coz it''s just a small one. The triple room we got was a bit cramped and so were the hallways and this was okay 'coz we were out most of the time anyway. I do appreciate though that the room and bathroom are clean. Clean towels were provided everyday, but other basic amenities like toothbrush, slippers, complimentary water and robes were not provided. What I liked best about this hotel is its proximity to Bugis and Suntec, which were literally, 5 minutes away by foot. It was also right beside 'steamboat' restaurants w/c gave us a chance to enjoy Singapore hot-pot at its best. The staff were also very accommodating and helpful. The buffet breakfast was adequate and nothing to complain about. They even allowed my 4-yr old to eat breakfast everyday for free. All in all, I think we got our money's worth during our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location - Price ok”
Reviews.Author: rfembach
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Singapore just for a Stop Over. It is quite hard to find a good priced hotel in this city. So we ended up at Park View Hotel. Everything is OK. The entrance appears more like a Guest House than a Hotel. People were very kind. Rooms are very small, but we did not care .... only stayed there at night. Breakfast is better than we expected on arrival. The location is really good. You can wald to the main sights and for nightlive to Marina Bay......

Reviews.Title: “this hotel made our stay in singapore fun and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Mdmercado
Reviews.Content: My husband, my 3 yr old son and me were allowed to check in even before 2 pm (hotel's check in time). The corridor leading to our room smells good. Our room has a homey ambiance and has a great view (shaw gallery). Bed is large enough for us and comfortable to sleep in. We were provided with towels, tissue, soap and shampoo with conditioner. Our room were cleaned everyday and toiletries replenished also everyday. Breakfast is delicious and served in buffet. It's a 5-10 mins walk to the bugis mrt station. Near to malls like bugis junction, bugis street (where you can buy souvenirs)suntec city and marina square. Accessible to many restaurants and wonderful places like mint museum of toys, esplanade and merlion park. Fast check out and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel & Great location”
Reviews.Author: Myjetlag
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Park View as part of my holiday with friends and it is not a bad choice  I had my concerns about this hotel prior to my arrival as I booked based on price and location and not what was mention on any web pages about the hotel. I am happy that I stayed here as rooms are clean, service is great and staff always on hand to help answer questions. Next time I am in Singapore I will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Could Have Been Better”
Reviews.Author: walkal0t
Reviews.Content: This being my first time staying in a hotel in Singapore, I was shocked to that budget accommodation (no frills) are priced so exorbitantly. I could have gotten a 4-star hotel in Malaysia for the price I paid at this hotel. Still, let's start with the good, shall we? The Good: - The Location is great as it is 5 - 10 minutes walking distance from Bugis Junction MRT station. - Surrounded by good and cheap eats. Steamboat restaurants abound at SGD18 per head and you can get a plate of chicken rice or noodles for just SGD3 or so. - The aircond works well - The shower water pressure is strong and steady. There are shower curtains, too. - Although we were facing the street (6th floor), we did not hear very loud street noises when we sleep at night. - I booked through Hotels Online and requested for Twin Beds and got what I asked for. I also liked it that they included the taxes and such into the price so that I do not have to pay for any surprise charges. - The reception was manned by the owner, if not mistaken. He speaks good English, not the friendliest demeanor but he is quite helpful when you ask for directions, etc. - The bed looks clean and I had a good night's sleep on the firm mattress. - The windows have thick black-out drapes which is great when you want to sleep in and block the sun out. - The breakfast is adequate and they do change the main dishes daily and refill the food trays when they are empty. - There are laundry bags. - There is a safe. - There are plenty of hangers. - There is a TV though we did not turn it on once - we are not TV people :) - The fridge works and they have tea/coffee making facilities. And now comes the fun part... The Bad: - There were mold on the bath tub tiles and under the sink. Pretty gross looking stuff! - No slippers for the bathroom. - No free WiFi internet - The room was small - just enough to fit in two twin beds and a small drawer in-between. - No complimentary water bottles. All things considered, it wasn't bad but it definitely could be better for the price we paid.

Reviews.Title: “superb climate with best location”
Reviews.Author: upamanyu
Reviews.Content: hotel is very good. swimming pool is mind blowing, hotel location is at the heart of little india. just behind the mustufa, one gate is open in mustufa. very nice place to stay. u can purchase room from site that is cheaper.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: AmitMagoo
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this hotel is its location in Singapore. This is ideal for business as well as leisure travel as it offers simply great value for money. Cleanliness is excellent and staff is friendly.

Reviews.Title: “"Never Again- terrible place"”
Reviews.Author: buttercup42
Reviews.Content: Stayed in May 2008..with my teenage daughter, I meant to book for BayView Hotel..but when I got there it was the ParkView , nothing I can do it is the address on my voucher booked on the internet..paid 110 SGD, the room we had was awful, going up the lift had no lights the passage is very tiny and dark smells awful of mildew/mold , or wet carpet..it's a dirty smell because of no fresh air , and not cleaned in years I feel like I'm gonna vomit,..went into the room very dark no window , very small same smell of mildew/mold and the bedding as we checked in looks like not changed and very old linens it smells, they dont change the bedding for the 3 nights we stayed, aircon .not working....we only go back to sleep late at night ..as I can't stand the room.it was the most terrible stopover experience in singapore...this time I'm back and making sure its Bay View I'm staying not Park View...terrible

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: dinram
Reviews.Content: we stayed here fopr 3 nights hotel is very nice and very conviniently located food is good

Reviews.Title: “Good 1st experience @ Singapore”
Reviews.Author: ajaycwa1981
Reviews.Content: Park view hotel located @ a very nice location in singapore where from many worth-seeing places are easily accessible I stayed for a week @ this hotel and it was a nice experience... The hotel has a lot of tie ups with tour operators and you get a good deal @ the hotel front desk for it... Overall, a nice 1st experience in singapore

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: ashee_washee
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel during our two-night stopover in Singapore before returning home. It was the hotel's location that got us to book it seeing that it was a few minutes walk to SUNTEC city and other attractions. We thought that Singapore had standards that are strictly enforced upon hotels so it never entered our minds that this hotel would be that horrible. -The beds had bugs in them and cigarette burn marks. It feels like it was never washed. The rooms are really, really OLD and very small for two persons (we booked the deluxe room with twin beds). -The free buffet breakfest was so-so -The front desk receptionist was okay. We were just not happy that they sent an old man to help carry our luggages Take my word for it - stay somewhere else!

Reviews.Title: “Taxi Driver always sent us to Park Royal instead ..”
Reviews.Author: zmj77
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this small hotel twice already for business trip in Singapore. Relatively OK, walking distance to eating & shopping place (i.e Bugis Junction). Rooms are too small for 2 person, therefore 1 person per room is more appropriate. S$1 for 15 minutes internet service at the lobby is not worth it, because it was too slow & monitor pixels failed me. Nothing special with the breakfast and even worst for Muslim because they served pork without label. One thing annoyed me, for some reason all taxi drivers in Singapore does not know the exact location of this small cute hotel .. they sent us to Park Royal @ Beach Road instead. Watch out ! the hotel owner will observe you once you enter the lobby .. haha

Reviews.Title: “Business Class”
Reviews.Author: ManjuBH
Reviews.Content: Simply Good, Location, Fine Executive Suite, Food and Very very close to Shopping

Reviews.Title: “loved park view”
Reviews.Author: DelhiHopper
Reviews.Content: Singapore's 'Park View Hotel' has an excellent location in the city centre. It's only 5 minutes walk from Raffles Hotel, 'Esplanade - Theatres by the Bay' and 'Merlion'. Chinatown is also just ten minutes away. My room had no window though, which wasn't ideal.

Reviews.Title: “A nice budget 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnDoe404
Reviews.Content: A nice budget 3 star hotel. S$188.50 after the ++ (17%). Only a twin was available but it had a window and didn't smell of mildew/mold so was much better than staying at Hotel 81 on Middle Road. Reception staff upon check in spoke perfect English. Was able to pick up the Free Wireless@SG from room 213 (Window facing road) Good local eating areas round the corner on Liang Seah St. and Bugis Junction Mall + MRT (train) are 300M (4 minute walk) I'll stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Wasn't what we expected”
Reviews.Author: beanbagdan
Reviews.Content: It is exactly two years since I stayed here, but a recent discussion with colleagues about Lost Property in hotels got me back to Trip Advisor to write this. The property and room were very much catering for Asian customers, with little English apparently spoken by reception staff. It was a fairly low cost hotel for our transit stay. However in our haste to leave, we did leave clothing and some other items in the room owing to my girlfriend slipping on the tiled floor and requiring medical treatment. Within an hour of leaving the hotel I called them to notify them that there were items in the room that I needed and was prepared to pay for postage back. After at least six phone calls to the hotel Singapore in the following days and weeks, nothing was ever done about returning the items. I see that the reputable website that originally did the booking is no longer accepting bookings from Parkview is probably testament to the problems too? There are better alternatives in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “okay if you're on a tight budget”
Reviews.Author: centrum
Reviews.Content: About a 3 star hotel by western standards. There were no doubles available for my husband and myself, so we were stuck with a dinky 2-twin room. We had 7 large pieces of luggage as we were on route to another destination for 1 month on business. The twins, were the skinniest twins ive slept on, tho the bed was soft, pillows comfortable. Bathroom was small as well. There was no room to really walk around in the room. Reminded me of a hotel in London. The room was fairly clean. Breakfast was fair. They serve eggs but only if you like them runny. Toast was good. Nothing outstanding here. If you’re on a budget and don’t care about the kicks, stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Small Room! Good Location!”
Reviews.Author: lissy79
Reviews.Content: Excellent location! A block away from many shops and Bugis Junction MRT! Lots of cheap restaurants and food on same street. Rooms very small, I mean you can hardly even walk around the bedroom and the bathroom is about 2m x 2m - seriously. Rooms are very tired and in need of repair. We were fortunate to have one with a window on 3rd floor, but i did notice there were many with no windows in the middle of the hotel. Breakfast is ok if desperate. Friendly staff - seemed like a family run business. Last minute booking at AUS $140 a night.

Reviews.Title: “Small, Clean, all you need”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had the deluxe room. It was not overly luxurious but the room was perfectly clean, quiet, and had aircon, small fridge and personal safe. All we needed. Only minus, the bathroom was a bit small (but no problem really) and we had nowhere obvious to store our suitcase. Nice central location, close to MRT station Bugis.

Reviews.Title: “Ok place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel for the money you pay. The rooms are clean and the people are very friendly. Only problem is that the standard rooms does not have any windows. Breakfast is average. Food is same everyday. Room size is decent.
